long_description: Keep your Grayl Stainless-Steel Water Filtration Cup (sold separately) in tip-top shape with this G3+ Replacement Filter. G3+ filter removes a wide range of chemicals, heavy metals and pathogens, making the Grayl suitable for use while camping and traveling; also improves the taste of tap water. Electroadsorption technology removes 99.99% of bacteria and 99.94% of protozoa, which can be found in tap water when municipal water systems fail or mountain streams. Each Grayl G3+ Replacement Filter is rated for 300 uses, which equals 40 gal. of water; filters 16 fl. oz. in about 15 sec.
